metadata.Title: CVE-2021-4183 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description:
Crash in the pcapng file parser in Wireshark 3.6.0 allows denial of servicevia crafted capture file

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-4183` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 3.6.7-1
libwireshark15 - 3.6.7-1
libwiretap12 - 3.6.7-1
libwsutil13 - 3.6.7-1
tshark - 3.6.7-1
wireshark - 3.6.7-1
wireshark-common - 3.6.7-1
wireshark-gtk - 3.6.7-1
wireshark-qt - 3.6.7-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wireshark package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.6.7-1').
